name: hlcms

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, ccms), wcel(c0, cbn))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ CHil, c0 ∈ CMetSp, c0 ∈ Ban)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, ccms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, cbn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccms))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ CMetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ Ban)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ CMetSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, ccms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, cbn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccms))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ CMetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ Ban)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ CMetSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chl), wcel(c0, ccms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccms))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil → c0 ∈ CMetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ CMetSp)

comment: Every subcomplex Hilbert space is a complete metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2015.)
